name: Cuesta Rey - Centenario - Maduro - Tuscany
additionalNotes: Cuesta Rey Centenario Maduro Cigars are a specialty blend of tobacco rolled at the Tabacalera A. Fuente factory, in the Dominican Republic. Ripe with smooth flavors, the Cuesta Rey Centenario Cigars use well aged long filler tobacco to achieve the ultimate smoking experience. A Dominican binder along with a five year aged Connecticut sun-grown Maduro wrapper encases each cigar. This is a medium-bodied cigar that exemplifies true craftsmanship.
